title: Smoked salmon and vegetable quiche
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '100g unsalted butter', '125g plain flour', '1 egg', '1 pinch salt', '1 dash lemon juice', 'For the filling', '80ml milk', '80ml double cream', '4 eggs', '100g crumbled feta cheese', '4 broccoli florets, chopped', '1/4 onion, chopped', '3 cloves garlic, chopped', '1/2 red pepper, chopped', '1/2 yellow pepper, chopped', '100g smoked salmon, cut into small pieces', 'salt and pepper, to taste']
